titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the Iraqi National Assembly should cancel or postpone its planned two-month recess scheduled to begin in July 2007 and work toward meeting political, social, and military benchmarks.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H6242)
Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
6/6/2007--Introduced.
Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Iraqi National Assembly should cancel or postpone its planned two-month recess scheduled to begin in July 2007, and work toward meeting political, social, and military benchmarks.
